summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 NISSAN FRONTIER.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT ALL NISSAN FRONTIERS NEED TO BE RECALLED REGARDING THE AIR BAGS AND SALT ISSUES.  THE RECALL ONLY APPLIED TO VEHICLES REGISTERED IN COLD STATES.  THE CONTACT LIVES IN TUCSON, AZ AT 2,000 FT. ELEVATION.  HE OWNS A WINTER CABIN AT 9,000 FT. AND STATED THAT HE WOULD EXPERIENCE THE SAME ISSUES AS SOMEONE WHO RESIDES IN A COLD STATE.  HIS VIN WAS EXCLUDED FROM NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 08V690000 (AIR BAGS:FRONTAL).  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 27,050.
